PROPER_NAME: This is displayed in the tooltip.
DESCRIPTION: This is displayed in the tooltip. Spaces should not be used be avoided in NAMES, with the exception of multi-word keywords (see next entry).
Make sure the first element in NAMES has no underscores. The rest should use _ in the place of spaces. In card text, you'll use the underscore versions.
Using the COLOR field, this keyword is colored pink instead of the normal keyword color.
When #b10 stacks are reached, #yIgnite the enemy dealing #b30 damage to #yIgnite enemy and #b15 to ALL others. If the enemy gains no #yScorch this turn, ALL #yScorch is removed.
Deal #b30 damage to #yIgnited enemy and #b15 to ALL others.
Heal HP equal to your stacks of #yCure at the end of your turn. Taking damage causes you to lose half of your #yCure stacks unless you were at full health at the end of your turn.
Doubles stacks at the end of the enemy's turn. Does nothing until the enemy has #b20 stacks of #ySlow, #yFreezing them for their next turn, skipping it.
A #yFrozen enemy skips their next turn. If it is dealt health damage by an attack before then, it #yShatters, removing #ySlow and dealing #b20 damage and applying #b3 #yWeak.
A #yShattered enemy is dealt #b20 damage and gains #b3 #yWeak.
Gain #yBlock at the end of your turn equal to the amount of #ySlow on ALL enemies. Lose #yFrost #yArmor at the start of your turn.
Gain X [E] this and next turn. Shuffle X #yVoids into your draw pile.
Whenever the enemy is dealt damage, apply #b1 #yWeak or #b1 #yVulnerable based on which is lower, then they lose #b1 #ySuppress.
Whenever you draw a #yVoid card, #yHunger #b1 and heal #b1 hp.
Whenever a #yJolted enemy is damaged, deal equivalent damage up to #yJolt stacks to another random enemy and remove that many stacks.
Whenever you play a card, deal X damage to a random enemy and lose #b1 #yAmp. Whenever you take health damage, lose X more HP.
Can be used as an alternate source of [E] to cast cards at a 2 #yWill : 1 [E] ratio.
